name: Yakuza Kiss
description: Yakuza Kiss is a [GxB] adult visual novel for the feminine audience. Join Jeong Moon on her descent through Cyan City - a neon hell ruled by the criminal underworld. Forced to join the Yakuza she catches the eye of Yuki Yamaguchi. To survive she needs to face her deepest fears and darkest desires...
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Windows 7/8/10 Процессор: 1.5GHz Оперативная память: 2 GB ОЗУ Видеокарта: DX10 compatible GPU DirectX: Версии 10 Место на диске: 2 GB
